Description:
Detects the use of the "nice" utility to execute a shell. Such behavior may be associated with privilege escalation, unauthorized command execution, or to break out from restricted environments.


Author: Li Ling, Andy Parkidomo, Robert Rakowski, Blake Hartstein (Bloomberg L.P.)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Shell Execution via Nice - Linux
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%/nice' and (command like '%/bin/bash' or command like '%/bin/dash' or command like '%/bin/fish' or command like '%/bin/sh' or command like '%/bin/zsh')
